Posts.Content: Jun 30, 2018 03:28PM Felrogyahoo wrote: Hi Larkin, thank you for your reply. Doc put me on Afinitor and Aromasin, with Xgeva continuing. So I'll do some research on that combo. My guess was also Xoleda. I'm sorry that med has been terrible for you.
Posts.Title: Ibrance no longer working Felrogyahoo Felrogyahoo

Posts.Content: Felrogyahoo wrote: I have an appt this Fri with my oncologist. They have the results of PET & CATscans. I was told to stop taking Ibrance last week. I've had a very good year on 125mg for which I'm grateful. Over the phone the doc only told me there is another oral form of medication. Since the bone mets diagnosis May 2017 in addition to Ibrance I'm getting Faslodex and Xgeva injections. In not sure what is next. In scared. Dx 10/2006, Right, 5cm, Stage IIIA, metastasized to bone, 7/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Dx 5/10/2017, IBC, Stage IV, metastasized to bone, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy Surgery Log in to post a reply
